lead_paragraph: Europe's indispensable nation, at the center of crises over Ukraine and Greece and often uncomfortable with leadership, has had a rocky month.

headline.main: Germans at the Crux of Crises, but Reluctantly
headline.print_headline: Germans at the Crux of Crises, but Reluctantly

snippet: Europe's indispensable nation, at the center of crises over Ukraine and Greece and often uncomfortable with leadership, has had a rocky month.
